DellD4D.description: The DellD4D schema is the D4D service page providing D4D actions report definitions and reports.
DellD4D.longDescription: This resource shall represent the D4D Service page.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HistoricalReports.description: The value is a URI.  The URI will provide all D4D Reports.
HistoricalReports.longDescription: The value is a link that will provide all D4D Reports.  The link will provide data in tar or zip content-types.  Zip is set by default.  To change the content type,  the request header shall update key Accept to either application/x-tar or to application/zip

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ReportDefinitions.description: The link to the collection of metric report definitions.
ReportDefinitions.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type MetricReportDefinitionCollection.

Reports.description: The link to the collection of d4d reports.
Reports.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type DellD4DReportCollection.

title: #DellD4D.v1_0_0.DellD4D
